name: Attack of the Karens Alpha
description:
Welcome to the alpha page for Attack of the Karens!  Your feedback will be SO helpful in improving the game!

Note this is an ALPHA release!  Bugs, sometimes game-breaking, are expected.  There is a feedback link in-game for you to report any issues.  

Controls:  

up/down/left/right - maneuver the ship

"z" - Fire primary weapon

XBOX controller is also supported! 

Analog stick - move

B button - fire
 

If you haven't already, please join the mailing list at my website to get monthly updates about the game (no spam). 

Please send me an e-mail with your observations.  Please report ANY and all bugs/issues you experience with the game!

This is NOT a press release build!  By downloading this build, you agree to an embargo of content on this page and/or in the game.  Press release builds will be announced at a future date.
